sentence: Michael Brown of Stevensville, Byron Center businesswoman Donna Brandenburg, Farmington Hills Pastor Ralph Rebandt, and Grand Haven financial adviser Michael Markey would not be onstage with their competitors.
author: Paul Egan
title: GOP candidate for governor balks at Detroit Chamber debate over COVID-19 requirements

sentence: Bureau staff also determined that three other lesser-known GOP candidates Donna Brandenburg, Michael Brown and Michael Markey did not turn in enough valid signatures.
author: DAVID EGGERT
title: Primary problem: Michigan GOP governor candidates short signatures
